description: The UI and UX is great. A tiny bit glitchy when you switch audio sources. Latency was not too bad but using this to watch videos might be a little jarring at times. Works well with Pipewire on Arch.
summary: A very useful app in certain situations

description: Instantaneous. Would be perfect if there is some indication or notification showing that it the app is running.

This app is perfect: it just works and it is so incredibly useful! I can just stream the audio from my laptop to my phone and it works seamlessly. I'm using an iPhone, I just need to scan the QR code and VLC opens and starts streaming the audio.

It's amazing!
Took 2 seconds to set up and works as advertised! As expected a bit of latency between devices .
I really like the concept, and the fact that it works well makes it even better!
summary: Great idea and works really well!

description: My laptop's speakers are broken, but with this app, I don't even need to buy replacement speakers. As the previous reviewer suggested, I downloaded VLC on my iPhone, scanned the QR code in the app, and my laptop's audip started playing out of my phone straight away. There is a small lag in playback as you might expect, but it couldn't have been easier to set up. Thank you!

A pesar de su latencia, yo la uso para compartir audio a mi movil y así me puedo ahorrar en cierta manera auriculares bluetooth. no es lo mismo, de hecho, este enfoque que tiene la app, permite conectar muchisimos dispositivos al mismo host, es como si tuvieras muchos auriculares bluetooth pero todos conectados al mismo tiempo!
There is some delay through this method, but is quite helpful if all I want to do is listen to music (which is like 95% of the time)!!
il manque un sinc pour faire un multiroom
